database

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    A Table object represent a data structure with rows and columns that exists in a database.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Theodosis Tsaklanos, Paris Mpampaniotis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table(java.lang.String tableName)
      Creates Table type objects that represent a table of the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEntry(Entry entry)
      Adds an entry (row) to this table.
      void addField(Field field)
      Adds a field (column) to this table.
      void checkForUnfilledElements(Table table, java.lang.String fieldName)
      When a new Field (column) is added to the database, all the existent records' value for this Field is set to NULL.
      void clearTable()
      Clears the Arraylists that contain the fields and the entries of the this table.

      • isThereAnyField

        public boolean isThereAnyField()
        Returns:

      • checkForUnfilledElements
